body_html:
I have observed similar failures:

$ python -m unittest test_nn.TestNN.test_variable_sequence_cuda -v
test_variable_sequence_cuda (test_nn.TestNN) ...
==================================================================
FAIL: test_variable_sequence_cuda (test_nn.TestNN) (dtype=torch.float16)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 65, in call_helper
    f(self, *args, dtype=dtype)
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 3270, in test_variable_sequence_cuda
    self._test_variable_sequence("cuda", dtype)
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 3260, in _test_variable_sequence
    self.assertEqual(x_leaf.grad, grad_x)
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 243, in assertEqual
    assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 235, in assertTensorsEqual
    self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: tensor(1.00000e-05 *
       3.0518, dtype=torch.float16, device='cuda:0') not less than or equal to 1e-05 :

$ python -m unittest test_nn.TestNN.test_Conv2d_groups_nobias -v
test_Conv2d_groups_nobias (test_nn.TestNN) ... FAIL
==================================================================
FAIL: test_Conv2d_groups_nobias (test_nn.TestNN)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 2933, in test_Conv2d_groups_nobias
    dtype2prec[dtype])
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 243, in assertEqual
    assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 235, in assertTensorsEqual
    self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: tensor(1.00000e-02 *
       1.5625, dtype=torch.float16, device='cuda:0') not less than or equal to 0.01 :

System Details

ppc64le
Power9 - 4 x Tesla GPU
RH7.5
CUDA 9.2 CuDNN 7.1.4
torch 0.4.0

body:
I have observed similar failures:
```
$ python -m unittest test_nn.TestNN.test_variable_sequence_cuda -v
test_variable_sequence_cuda (test_nn.TestNN) ...
==================================================================
FAIL: test_variable_sequence_cuda (test_nn.TestNN) (dtype=torch.float16)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 65, in call_helper
    f(self, *args, dtype=dtype)
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 3270, in test_variable_sequence_cuda
    self._test_variable_sequence("cuda", dtype)
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 3260, in _test_variable_sequence
    self.assertEqual(x_leaf.grad, grad_x)
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 243, in assertEqual
    assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 235, in assertTensorsEqual
    self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: tensor(1.00000e-05 *
       3.0518, dtype=torch.float16, device='cuda:0') not less than or equal to 1e-05 :

$ python -m unittest test_nn.TestNN.test_Conv2d_groups_nobias -v
test_Conv2d_groups_nobias (test_nn.TestNN) ... FAIL
==================================================================
FAIL: test_Conv2d_groups_nobias (test_nn.TestNN)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/builder/test/test_nn.py", line 2933, in test_Conv2d_groups_nobias
    dtype2prec[dtype])
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 243, in assertEqual
    assertTensorsEqual(x, y)
  File "/home/builder/test/common.py", line 235, in assertTensorsEqual
    self.assertLessEqual(max_err, prec, message)
AssertionError: tensor(1.00000e-02 *
       1.5625, dtype=torch.float16, device='cuda:0') not less than or equal to 0.01 :
```

System Details
```
ppc64le
Power9 - 4 x Tesla GPU
RH7.5
CUDA 9.2 CuDNN 7.1.4
torch 0.4.0
```
